statements: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chapter_links( id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, created_at TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')), chapter_id TEXT, link TEXT, curriculum_id TEXT, course_id TEXT, grade_id TEXT, updated_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), is_deleted INTEGER );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS program ( id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, created_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), updated_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), name TEXT NOT NULL, model TEXT NOT NULL, is_deleted INTEGER, school_id TEXT, is_ops INTEGER, implementation_partner TEXT, funding_partner TEXT, institute_partner TEXT, country TEXT, state TEXT, block TEXT, cluster TEXT, village TEXT, program_type TEXT, institutes_count TEXT, students_count TEXT, devices_count TEXT, start_date TEXT, end_date TEXT, program_manager TEXT, district TEXT);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ops_requests ( id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, class_id TEXT, created_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')), is_deleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0, rejected_reason_description TEXT, rejected_reason_type TEXT, request_ends_at TEXT, request_id TEXT, request_status TEXT, request_type TEXT, requested_by TEXT, requested_to TEXT, responded_by TEXT, school_id TEXT, updated_at TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')) );
